author: Dr15Jones
body:
Implementations of the Propagator methods modify member data and therefore these methods can not be `const`. The decision was if one uses a Propagator one must first `clone` the object. This change removes `const` from all the actually non-const member functions and then changes all APIs in CMSSW which were using those methods.
This change is necessary for thread-safety.
title: Remove mutables from Propagators
